taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family Caryophyllaceae;subfamily Caryophylloideae;genus Dianthus;species armeria;subspecies armeria;

bio:treatment.discussion: Subspecies armeria is occasionally cultivated, as in Louisiana, where apparently it has not yet escaped. It was collected at Stephenville, Newfoundland, in 1972 (Rouleau 11293, CAN, MT), but apparently has not become established there.
